# isAirPlayVideoActive

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the movie player is currently playing video via AirPlay.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAirPlayVideoActive: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You can query this property after receiving an [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerIsAirPlayVideoActiveDidChangeNotification] notification to find out whether the AirPlay video started or stopped.

## Accessing movie properties

- **contentURL**: The URL that points to the movie file.
- **movieSourceType**: The playback type of the movie.
- **movieMediaTypes**: The types of media available in the movie.
- **allowsAirPlay**: Specifies whether the movie player allows AirPlay movie playback.
- **naturalSize**: The width and height of the movie frame.
- **isFullscreen**: A Boolean that indicates whether the movie player is in full-screen mode.
- **setFullscreen(_:animated:)**: Causes the movie player to enter or exit full-screen mode.
- **scalingMode**: The scaling mode to use when displaying the movie.
- **controlStyle**: The style of the playback controls.
- **useApplicationAudioSession**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the movie player should use the app’s audio session.
